title: Learned Solution: Sources/ViewModels/CurrencyViewModel.swift:39:92: ...
content:
Error: Sources/ViewModels/CurrencyViewModel.swift:39:92: error: expected expression in conditional; Sources/ViewModels/CurrencyViewModel.swift:41:9: error: expected expression; Sources/ViewModels/CurrencyViewModel.swift:43:26: error: value of optional type 'Double?' must be unwrapped to a value of type 'Double'

Solution: Fixed 4 errors using RAG patterns
